parameters: It's Ino and Fiede, I see.
Didn't expect to see you again so soon.
What is your purpose, I wonder──
what is Miss Luora doing here?
I'm checking on the camp's wellbeing.
Wait... is it fine for us, or rather,
for this guy to even come here?
But right now, I'm... not quite sure.
Speaking of which, aren't these kids
Well, they've always been that active sexually.
Not so much that they lost all sense of reason, though.
In the first place, monsters attack men to gain Mana──
I wonder if they're running out of Mana for some reason.
The lack of Mana isn't unique to this place, though?
That's true, but they're trying their best, you know?
Maybe they just couldn't take it anymore,
Maybe, but it's not good to make a decision without
doing any research, right? That's why I came here.
...then let us give you a hand.
Maybe I should go hear from the monsters?
Why are you helping her out all of a sudden?
It's true we have a request of her.
However, to ask for a helping hand without listening
to her story or circumstances is simply unfair.
I thought just asking for it is enough.
Like, "Can you be my companion?" and such.
If Luora didn't have another purpose in mind,
that might've been a reasonable approach.
Does that mean if you give her favors first,
your request will be harder to refuse?
Anyway, let's go gather some information.
I'm not sure if it's related, but we'll do
May I ask why you are so certain?
A Barbarian's hunting ground is a place to get
materials, foodstuffs, and Mana to live.
Then, the fact that it's taken away is...
You just can't live at all.
It's not even about Mana anymore.
We must head for the site immediately.
Place's at the back of the camp, right?
You can't get lost going to it, so I'll
Is such a place supposed to be for hunting?
Let's try not to get ethical, I guess...
...For the time being, we returned here.
You're looking glum. What's with you?
the world looks so much more terrifying.
Want me to be your friend?
...Well then, can you tell me your name?
Well, let's work hard from now on, yeah?
you can change party members in Earthless Ainoa.
You may add and remove any party members except Ino
You can also remove Fiede, but she'll always
accompany Ino even when not in the party.
Should we go after Miss Luora?
and she probably already popped up elsewhere.
Shall we give priority to finding the Lord of Reason?
Don't forget to invite monsters to the party.
Seduce them with your dick, eh?
I wish clothes could just become clean on their own...
From here onwards is our hunting ground.
Try not to, um... take too much, okay?
ちょっと聞きたいことが……
あんた、あのときのオスじゃん！
あのときって……襲いかかってきたときのことか？
いや、確かあのときは複数の蛮族がいて……
その内の一人ですよね？
……似たような見た目だから分かんねーよ。
って、前にも同じこと言った気がする。
もしかして私に搾られたくなった！？
聞きたいことがありまして──
ルオーラの居場所ねー。
正確な情報じゃなくてもいいんです。
行きそうな場所など、知りませんか？
一日一回は\C[17]茂みの塔\C[0]に行くとか言ってた気がする。
何しに行くのかは知らないけどね。
うん、南の方にある変なとこ。
そこで待ってれば会えるかも？
旅立ちのタンターリの先にあるのでしょうか。
位置的にはそうだけど、今はタンターリから
更に南には進めなかったような。
トロッコの動作不良だかで……
それじゃあ、どうやって行けばいいんだ。
私たちの狩場は知ってる？
ちょっと前にそこに百足が湧いたんだけど、
そいつらが掘った穴が南まで続いてるんだよね。
それってもしかして、ルオーラが飛び込んだ……
あの穴は行き止まりだったと聞きましたが。
うん、行き止まり「だった」よ。
まあそう言うと思ったけど。
さて、私も出かけよっと。
イベントの\C[17]大地を覆う影\C[0]が更新されました。
